description_html:
Sailor and Lula are deeply in love, but Lula's mom Marietta doesn't approve of the relationship. They seek to get away but trouble finds them.

Written and Directed by David Lynch, Wild at Heart adds a bit of surrealism — inspired by The Wizard of Oz — to Sailor and Lula's illicit romance.
story_html:
Make it personal (first and second person ok), preferably with a beginning, middle, and end.

To keep up to date, follow this site on social media or subscribe to the Artsy Visions Monthly Newsletter!!
affiliate_ad_html:
Get the DVD!

Wild at Heart is a great film, and we highly recommend watching it.

Clicking on the affiliate link below and making a purchase helps to support this site, at no additional cost to you.

image_list.title: Sailor Ripley
image_list.gallery_page_teaser: Sailor's spiritual portrait shows he is passionate and very open to new experiences and ideas.  Click on the image to learn more!
image_list.explain_dom: The Red in this spiritual portrait represents X's dominant personality trait, Feeling: passion; amiability; friendliness; compassion; warmth; very slight/moderate/strong preference for emotion/empathy/subjectivity over logic/reason/objectivity; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for the/tendency to be more emotional/personal/subjective over the logical/rational/objective.

The Red in X's spiritual portrait represents their dominant personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for making emotional/personal/objective rather than logical/rational/objective decisions; their very slight/moderate/strong preference for being/tendency to be more emotional/personal/subjective rather than logical/impersonal/objective.
image_list.explain_dom_constant: In Introverts, the dominant trait is directed inwardly, and spiritual portraits use a long horizontal line to represent this.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
image_list.explain_aux: The Yellow in this spiritual portrait represents X's auxiliary personality trait, Sensing: pragmatism; pragmatic; practical; realism; realistic; outlook; openness to experiences; very slight/moderate/strong preference for facts over ideas.

The Yellow in X's spiritual portrait represents their auxiliary personality trait, their very slight/moderate/strong preference for seeing/tendency to see the world more in terms of facts rather than of ideas; need for sensual stimulation.
image_list.explain_aux_constant: In Introverts, the auxiliary trait is directed outwardly, and spiritual portraits use a vertical line to represent this, because it is more evident than the dominant function.  He/She demonstrates/exhibits this trait in their (note that is easier to find examples of decisions than perceptions!) ....
